AUROC=0.6177579388882986	AUPRC=0.15750988852582964	Accuracy=0.9394734081611246	Recall=0.018739352640545145	Precision=0.9166666666666666	f1_score=0.03672787979966611

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.94      1.00      0.97      8946
        case       0.92      0.02      0.04       587

   micro avg       0.94      0.94      0.94      9533
   macro avg       0.93      0.51      0.50      9533
